title: NFL Draft Analyst Mike Mayock breaks down broadcasting career (Football 06/18)
description:
NFL Draft analyst Mike Mayock joins CBS Sports Senior Fantasy writer Dave Richard to discuss his career path into the broadcasting world, detailing how he has attacked assignments and various roles throughout the year, while also extensively discussing his process as a draft evaluator.
